div.head: Description of changes for 2012.11
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a draft constructed from a copy of a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne mansucript still needs to be completed. Additions and corrections await a collation of comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still need to be constructed.
